ground.name: The Energy Check Stadium at Gigg Lane

content.text: Match ends, Bury 4, Wigan Athletic 0.
Second Half ends, Bury 4, Wigan Athletic 0.
Substitution, Bury. Scott Burgess replaces Jacob Mellis.
Attempt missed. David Perkins (Wigan Athletic) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right.
Corner,  Wigan Athletic. Conceded by Nathan Cameron.
Attempt missed. Max Power (Wigan Athletic) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Substitution, Bury. Reece Brown replaces Tom Soares.
Attempt blocked. Craig Davies (Wigan Athletic) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Craig Davies (Wigan Athletic) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the left.
